1.name: 1. Star Trek: The Next Generation
1.description: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's 5-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers sets off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on its own mission to go where no one has gone before.

2.name: 2. The Princess Bride
2.description: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

3.name: 3. The Lost Boys
3.description: After moving to a new town, two brothers discover that the area is a haven for vampires.

4.name: 4. Full Metal Jacket
4.description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

5.name: 5. Married with Children
5.description: Al is the quintessential working class dad. Peggy, his wife, always wants more from him. With their children, they go through the highs and lows of ordinary life.

6.name: 6. Predator
6.description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

7.name: 7. Full House
7.description: A widowed sportscaster raises his three daughters with assistance from his rock and roll brother-in-law and madcap best friend.

8.name: 8. Spaceballs
8.description: A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.

9.name: 9. RoboCop
9.description: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

10.name: 10. Dirty Dancing
10.description: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

11.name: 11. Fatal Attraction
11.description: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

12.name: 12. No Way Out
12.description: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

13.name: 13. The Untouchables
13.description: During Prohibition, Treasury agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and assembles a small, incorruptible team to help him.

14.name: 14. Beverly Hills Cop II
14.description: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

15.name: 15. Run
15.description: In a dystopian America, a falsely convicted policeman gets his shot at freedom when he must forcibly participate in a TV game show where convicts, runners, must battle killers for their freedom.

16.name: 16. The Bold and the Beautiful
16.description: The saga of high fashion glamour, honor, romance, passion, and most importantly, family.

17.name: 17. Yli Laidan
17.description: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia after an accident, he decides to introduce her to regular life by convincing her that they're husband and wife.

18.name: 18. Inspector Morse
18.description: Chief Inspector Morse has an ear for Western classical music, a taste for beer, and a nose for crime. He and Detective Sergeant Robert Lewis solve intriguing cases in and around the Oxford area.

19.name: 19. Lethal Weapon
19.description: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

20.name: 20. Hellraiser
20.description: A woman discovers the newly resurrected, partially formed, body of her brother-in-law and lover. She starts killing for him to revitalize his body and escape the demonic beings that are pursuing him after he escaped their underworld.

21.name: 21. 21 Jump Street
21.description: The cases of an undercover police unit composed of young-looking officers specializing in youth crime.

22.name: 22. Adventures in Babysitting
22.description: A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

23.name: 23. Masters of the Universe
23.description: The heroic warrior He-Man battles against the evil lord Skeletor and his armies of darkness for control of Castle Grayskull.

24.name: 24. Jaws: The Revenge
24.description: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

25.name: 25. Raising Arizona
25.description: When a childless couple--an ex-con and an ex-cop--decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.
